};function App(){const products=[{id:1,name:'Laptop',category:'Electronics',price:999,image:demonBluray,rating:4},{id:2,name:'Shirt',category:'Clothing',price:29,image:demonBluray,rating:4},{id:3,name:'Book',category:'Books',price:19,image:demonBluray,rating:4}];const recommendedProducts=[{id:4,name:'Smartphone',category:'Electronics',price:599,image:demonBluray,rating:4},{id:5,name:'Jacket',category:'Clothing',price:49,image:demonBluray,rating:4}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Router,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navbar,{}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs(Routes,{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(MainPage,{products:products,recommendedProducts:recommendedProducts})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/account",element:user.isLoggedIn?user.isAdmin?/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminPage,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AccountPage,{}):/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Navigate,{to:"/signup"})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/signup",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(SignupPage,{})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(Route,{path:"/admin",element:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(AdminPage,{})})]})]})});}export default App;
